fields.name: ActAssets_GASB
fields.description: Actuarial assets under GASB standards. . Actuarial assets will often differ from market assets in a given year because actuarial assets are calculated using techniques that smooth out fluctuations in the level of assets that arise from investment gains an

fields.name: ActLiabilities_GASB
fields.description: Actuarial accrued liabilities under GASB standards.. The actuarial accrued liability is equal to the present value of future benefits, discounted using the plan's assumed long term investment return.

fields.name: ActFundedRatio_GASB
fields.description: Funded ratio under GASB standards.. The funded ratio is equal the the actuarial assets divided by the actuarial liability.

fields.name: UAAL_GASB
fields.description: Unfunded Actuarial Accrued Liability under GASB standards.. The unfunded actuarial accrued liability is equal the the actuarial accrued liability minus actuarial assets.

fields.name: payroll
fields.description: Covered payroll. The total pensionable earnings of plan participants.

fields.name: RequiredContribution
fields.description: Employer's Annual Required Contribution. This variable reflects the employer's annual required contribution as reported in the required supplementary tables for GASB accounting purposes. The variable for the employer's contribution for funding purposes is

fields.name: PercentReqContPaid
fields.description: Percent of Employer's contribution paid. Funding commitment – the degree to which the plan sponsor regularly and fully pays its required contributions to the plan – is a critical factor in assessing the current and future health of a pension plan and an i

fields.name: ActAssets_est
fields.description: Estimated Actuarial Assets. Indicator that actuarial assets are estimated by CRR.

fields.name: ActLiabilities_est
fields.description: Estimated Actuarial Liabilities. Indicator that actuarial liabilities are estimated by CRR.

fields.name: ActFundedRatio_est
fields.description: Estimated Actuarial Funded Ratio. Indicator that actuarial funded ratio are estimated by CRR.

fields.name: RequiredContribution_est
fields.description: Estimated Employer Annual Required Contribution. Indicator that Employer's Annual Required Contribution are estimated by CRR.

fields.name: ActValDate_GASBSchedules
fields.description: Actuarial valuation date for GASB Schedules.
